A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Changed up the formula\, took risks that paid off\, had some of the most gripping and emotional scenes in the entire saga\, brilliant visuals\, twists I didn't see coming\, and a lot more. Yes it had some flaws. Some of the comic relief felt forced and out of place. I felt it could have been less action packed and had more breathing room. By no means is this the worst Star Wars film in the saga. I would watch this movie 5 times in a row before I submit myself to the self-torture that is Episode 2.
